item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description:
Azure strikes me as a collection of best practices for hosting services, not only from the cloud, but ideally from a larger scale enterprise. At present, I am most intrigued by the Fabric Manager. It manages load, compares it to SLA's and then ramps up or down servers appropriately.
Check out http://mschnlnine.vo.llnwd.net/d1/pdc08/WMV-HQ/ES19.wmv
item.content:encoded:
Azure strikes me as a collection of best practices for hosting services, not only from the cloud, but ideally from a larger scale enterprise. At present, I am most intrigued by the Fabric Manager. It manages load, compares it to SLA’s and then ramps up or down servers appropriately.

Check out http://mschnlnine.vo.llnwd.net/d1/pdc08/WMV-HQ/ES19.wmv
